title: How Phishing Attacks Adapt Quickly to Capitalize on Current Events
description: In 2023, no fewer than 94 percent of businesses were impacted by phishing attacks, a 40 percent increase compared to the previous year, according to research from Egress. What's behind the surge in phishing?
